modName: Eryniel Elf Reborn- NSFW Nude Patches - UNP - CBBE - ADEC - E55 - Pandora
summary: Nude body patches for  standalone Elf companion Eryniel - UNP - CBBE - ADEC - E55 - Pandora
descriptionHtml:
[img]http://static-8.nexusmods.com/15/mods/110/images/30175-1-1363702095.jpg[/img]
[center][color=#E9A305][size=4]Nude body patches[/size][/color][/center]

Note: These patches do not affect anything in "Vanilla" game, they will affect only Eryniel. It is irrelevant what overall body replacer you have installed.

[center][size=+2][color=#7CFC00]UNP body[/color][/size][/center]

Main file from the main Eryniel page is REQUIRED to be installed prior to any of UNP Nude patches, so

[b][color=#ADFF2F]1st:[/color][/b] Head to [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/30175]Eryniel Elf Standalone Follower w Spriggan Magic[/url] and download and install Eryniel Elf Main file. In the main file Eryniel already has UNP body with underwear.

[b][color=#ADFF2F]2nd:[/color][/b] Now you can apply UNP nude patch to Eryniel from this page. You can choose from:
- UNP Skinny - this patch will give Eryniel the same UNP body as she has in the main file, but without underwear.
- UNP More Curve - this patch will give Eryniel more curvaceous UNP body without underwear. Recommended for those who would like Eryniel to have "more weight".

[center][size=+2][color=#7CFC00]CBBE body[/color][/size][/center]

Main file AND CBBE Nevernude patch from the main Eryniel page are REQUIRED to be installed prior to any of CBBE Nude patches, so

[b][color=#ADFF2F]1st:[/color][/b] Head to [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/30175]Eryniel Elf Standalone Follower w Spriggan Magic[/url] and download and install Eryniel Elf.

[b][color=#ADFF2F]2nd:[/color][/b] Then, from the same page, download and install the "Eryniel Elf Reborn CBBE patch - Slim Nevernude - underwear textures by Rip88" file from the OPTIONAL FILES downloads section. This converts Eryniel from UNP body to CBBE body.

[b][color=#ADFF2F]3rd:[/color][/b] Now you can apply CBBE nude patch from this page. You can choose from:
- CBBE Slim - this patch will give Eryniel the same CBBE body as she has in CBBE patch on the main page, but without underwear.
- CBBE More Curve - this patch will give Eryniel more curvaceous CBBE body without underwear. Recommended for those who would like Eryniel to have "more weight".

[center][size=+2][color=#7CFC00]E55 body[/color][/size][/center]

Main file from the main Eryniel page is REQUIRED to be installed prior to E55 Nude patch, so

[b][color=#ADFF2F]1st:[/color][/b] Head to [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/30175]Eryniel Elf Standalone Follower w Spriggan Magic[/url] and download and install Eryniel Elf Main file.

[b][color=#ADFF2F]2nd:[/color][/b] Now you can apply E55 Body patch to Eryniel from this page.


[center][size=+2][color=#7CFC00]ADEC body[/color][/size][/center]

Main file from the main Eryniel page is REQUIRED to be installed prior to ADEC Body Nude Patch, so

[b][color=#ADFF2F]1st:[/color][/b] Head to [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/30175]Eryniel Elf Standalone Follower w Spriggan Magic[/url] and download and install Eryniel Elf Main file.

[b][color=#ADFF2F]2nd:[/color][/b] Now you can apply ADEC Body patch to Eryniel from this page.

Note: Special custom skeleton for ADEC body is included in this download. This skeleton will replace Eryniel's default one and she will use it instead. ADEC body NUde patch contains all the necessary textures to make switching from default Eryniel's UNP or CBBE bodies easier.

[center][size=+2][color=#7CFC00]Pandora body[/color][/size][/center]

Main file from the main Eryniel page is REQUIRED to be installed prior to Pandora Body Nude Patch, so

[b][color=#ADFF2F]1st:[/color][/b] Head to [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/30175]Eryniel Elf Standalone Follower w Spriggan Magic[/url] and download and install Eryniel Elf Main file.

[b][color=#ADFF2F]2nd:[/color][/b] Now you can apply Pandora Body patch to Eryniel from this page.

Note: Pandora body requires special custom skeleton, which is included in this download. This skeleton will replace Eryniel's default one and she will use it instead. This patch contains all the necessary textures to make switching from UNP or CBBE bodies easier and it also contains special custom normal map for Pandora body. It is recommended to keep this normal map and not overwrite it with any other custom normal map from another body mod.
Pandora body project is still work in progress, so you might encounter some texture dissimilarity, but as we like this body type very much we will keep you posted and updated. You can find below the direct link to Pandora body project and a link to clothes mod for Pandora body:
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/34566/]Pandora body replacer by mk1mk2[/url]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/34725]High heels and cloth sets for Pandora body by mk1mk2[/url]

[center][size=+2][color=#7CFC00]Wet Body Patches[/color][/size][/center]

Special specular maps set to give the skin shiny wet look.
Install AFTER all the body patches of your choice.

UNP and PANDORA BODY users can find this patch in the Misscelaneous downloads section on this page.

E55, CBBE and ADEC users will have to wait a little longer, as CBBE and E55 versions of this patch are not ready yet.

Note that to icrease the effect of these specular maps and make Eryniel's skin look even more wet and shiny it is recommended to use an ENB - ANY ENB of your choice would do, but you need to go to:
[ENVIRONMENT] section in enbseries.ini and find these lines and change them accordingly
(the higher the number of these settings the more "wet" it will look - just play around with the numbers and see what works for you). You can see the effects better indoor right next to a light source.

SpecularAmountMultiplierDay=5.0
SpecularAmountMultiplierNight=5.0
SpecularAmountMultiplierInterior=5.0
SpecularPowerMultiplierDay=6.0
SpecularPowerMultiplierNight=6.0
SpecularPowerMultiplierInterior=6.0
(KEEP THESE TWO AT 0)
SpecularFromLightDay=0.0
SpecularFromLightNight=0.0


[center][size=+2][color=#7CFC00]No Tattoo Patches[/color][/size][/center]

No Tattoo patches to remove the body art (tattoo) from Eryniel Elf.
These patches are simple body texture replacements, they do not affect body shape, and they do not affect Underwear. You can download and install these patches over Nevernude Eryniel version as well as over Nude body patches.
Meaning: if you install No Tattoo patch over Nevernude Eryniel version with underwear - the body tattoo will be removed, and Eryniel will still have her Nevernude body with underwear. If you install No tattoo patch over Eryniel with Nude body - the body tattoo will be removed, but Eryniel will still have her Nude body.

PANDORA BODY users: If you have Eryniel with Pandora body and would like to apply NoTattoo patch to her - you must download and install No Tattoo for UNP patch.

ADEC BODY users: If you have Eryniel with ADEC body and would like to apply NoTattoo patch to her - you must download and install No Tattoo for CBBE patch.


[center][size=+2][color=#7CFC00]Futanari/Dick Girl - If this is not your thing simply stop reading[/color][/size][/center]

What's an elf without futanari, right? This isn't a patch, instead it is a workaround to set the game right. I'll teach you how to fish:

[b][color=#ADFF2F]1st:[/color][/b] follow the instructions above to get CBBE or UNP nude body.
[b][color=#ADFF2F]2nd:[/color][/b] Head to [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/10791]Futanarium - for CBBE and UNP[/url] You will need these 2 files: Futanarium main file v1-2 PLUS Futanarium_equippable. Both very stable mods. Install these files, they have no dependancies.
[b][color=#ADFF2F]3rd:[/color][/b] When you start back up your game you will have a peice of equipment in inventory. Give it to the Follower. They will love you for it and wear it forever.

[img]http://static-2.nexusmods.com/15/mods/110/images/30175-4-1360392121.jpg[/img]

[size=4][b][color=#ADFF2F]Equipment and pose mods used in the pics:[/color][/b][/size]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/10431]Directors Tools[/url]
[url=http://mod.dysintropi.me/mods/skyrim/]Pinup Poser[/url]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/15143/?]Castanistic or Highelf style idle for females -replacer- by Sharkh[/url]

[size=4][b][color=#ADFF2F]Many thanks and credits to the authors of textures and meshes used to create nude patches for Eryniel:[/color][/b][/size]

- Glosshouse team: eronel55, Xazomn, kendo2, Ginnyfizz for [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/12694//?]E55 Female Body Replacer[/url]
- Dimon99 for the beautiful UNP skinny body [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/6709]Dimonized UNP Female Body by Dimon99[/url]
- Halofarm for UNPC body meshes [url=http://mod.dysintropi.me/mods/skyrim/]UNPC Body and Clothing[/url]
- Caliente for [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/2666]Calientes Female Body Mod Big Bottom Edition -CBBE[/url]
- Bhaktisean for custom Lunari race CBBE body mesh [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/21602]Lunari Race[/url]
- Acdale for [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/5390//?]Acdale EyeCandy Body ADEC[/url]
- mk1mk2 for [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/34566/]Pandora female body replacer[/url]
- Navetsea for the body skin texture and normal map: [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=6554]CBBE skin texture V2 V3 plus Thepal and UNP compatible[/url]
- alt3rn1ty for the seamless version: [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/30181]Alt Navetsea UNP Seamless[/url]
- Phygit for beautiful femfeet: [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/3666]Phygit's FemFeet[/url]
- MrTroubleMaker for great hands meshes: [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/30179]Better Hand Mesh for UNP UNPB[/url]

[img]http://static-8.nexusmods.com/15/mods/110/images/30175-1-1360897585.jpg[/img]

- This mod is a Skyrim Nexus exclusive release. If we wish our mod to be reuploaded to the other site, we are perfectly capable of doing it ourselves. Please respect our decision and [color=#7CFC00]DO NOT reupload our mod, or any altered version of our mod elsewhere. [/color] If you want this mod to be available on your website or blog - provide a direct link to our mod page so that people can download it from here and not on mediafire or similar places. Please refrain from asking permission for reupload, we did not give, or want to give a permission for any kind of reupload.
- Eryneil has special body, face and underwear textures, that were edited and modified specifically for this mod - so if you want to use them in your own mod - you have to obtain our written content first.
- This mod also contains assets belonging to the other mod authors, that can't be redistributed without permission. We can not pass on the permissions for Eryniel's assets - you will need to seek permission from all mod authors mentioned in our credits yourself, before you can use the assets from this file to modify them in any way.
- The translations permission requests are welcome, providing that:
You PM us for permission in advance,
You will leave the original file structure intact
You will use original screenshots
You will include the original readme file
You will link back to the original file here at Nexus (put a clearly visible credit and a link back to our original mod on your translation mod page).
You will notify us when your translation is published and send us a link to the page where your translation was published
Most importantly: you will have to credit us as the original authors.
